name: Boss Game
description:
The financial crisis has swept the world! It caused factories broken. As a boss, can you make a comeback? This is a cartoon style game of factory business simulation and placement. You will run a factory, recruit workers to make products. You can upgrade machinery and props to get more funds, then to start more new businesses and improve the efficiency of the factory. Coordinate the worker's workflow, upgrade in time to ensure a constant work chain.

Hire managers to boost the working progress at the right time and earn more money.

Game features:
*Manage your own factories and automated workflows to get more idle funds.
*Workstation will run for all day long, even when you are offline.
*Invest the idle cash to increase your income.
*Hire Manager to motivate the workers;
*Manage dozens of different workstations.
*No internet connection required.
*Watch ads to get items.

Do you want to be a factory tycoon? Come and download the game now!
